description: For unbeatable performance and versatility, their Aenergy Light styles solve for a full range of seasons and pursuits. Combining the right touch of warmth with exceptional wicking and breathability, this ultra-light midlayer doubles as a warm base layer to see you through winter ski tours and summer hikes alike. With a deep half zip for optimal ventilation and a laminated pocket to stash essentials, it’s the perfect choice for all who seek maximum performance at minimal weight.
name: Mammut Aenergy Light ML Half Zip Pullover - Mens
